item.title: R to @exploringjs: 3/3 ‚Äì Chapter on numbers: upgraded sections on float precision and bitwise operators ‚Äì Bonus chapter ‚ÄúNext steps‚Äù now covers Progressive Web Apps and WebAssembly. ‚Äì Many other improvements, all over the book
item.dc:creator: @exploringjs
item.description:
3/3
‚Äì Chapter on numbers: upgraded sections on float precision and bitwise operators
‚Äì Bonus chapter ‚ÄúNext steps‚Äù now covers Progressive Web Apps and WebAssembly.
‚Äì Many other improvements, all over the book

item.title: R to @exploringjs: 2/3 More highlights: ‚Äì Major rewrite of chapter on modules, e.g. new section on npm packages ‚Äì Many improvements of chapters on Typed Arrays and callable values ‚Äì Better sections on concurrency in chapters on Promises and async functions
item.dc:creator: @exploringjs
item.description:
2/3 More highlights:
‚Äì Major rewrite of chapter on modules, e.g. new section on npm packages
‚Äì Many improvements of chapters on Typed Arrays and callable values
‚Äì Better sections on concurrency in chapters on Promises and async functions

item.title:
1/3 A new release of ‚ÄúJavaScript for impatient programmers‚Äù out!
Now free to read: chapter ‚ÄúAsynchronous iteration‚Äù. This is the last essential chapter that was missing from the public version; which is therefore complete now.
http://exploringjs.com/impatient-js/
item.dc:creator: @exploringjs
item.description:
1/3 A new release of ‚ÄúJavaScript for impatient programmers‚Äù out!

Now free to read: chapter ‚ÄúAsynchronous iteration‚Äù.
This is the last essential chapter that was missing from the public version; which is therefore complete now.
